name: REQ_MOVE_AUDIT
description: The table contains audit information for requisition contact moves.

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the requisition record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MOVE_ACTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Type of action performed for the requisition move

columns.name: RQG_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: Requisition grouper patient's ID (RQG) associated with the requisition move

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: User who performed the requisition move

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ACTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: UTC Instant when the requisition move was performed

columns.name: WORKSTATION_ID
columns.description: Workstation from where the requisition move was performed

columns.name: DEPARMENT_ID
columns.description: Department from where the requisition move was performed
